medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at 3 PM yesterday with nausea; patient has not vomited. Appetite decreased, has not tried to eat since pain onset. Passing flatus and had bowel movements with the last one yesterday afternoon. Pain is associated with moderate tenderness in the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previous hospital admission for SMA syndrome from rapid weight loss related to wrestling, treated conservatively; no issues with abdominal pain or intolerance since then.
